  1. org.springframework.boot.actuate.endpoint.web.annotation

Uses of Package
org.springframework.boot.actuate.endpoint.web.annotation

Packages that use org.springframework.boot.actuate.endpoint.web.annotation
Package
Description
org.springframework.boot.actuate.context.properties
Actuator support relating to external configuration properties.
org.springframework.boot.actuate.endpoint.web.annotation
Annotation support for actuator web endpoints.
org.springframework.boot.actuate.env
Actuator support for Spring Framework's Environment.
org.springframework.boot.actuate.logging
Actuator support for logging.
org.springframework.boot.actuate.management
Actuator support for JVM management.
org.springframework.boot.actuate.sbom
Actuator support for SBOMs.
org.springframework.boot.cache.actuate.endpoint
Actuator endpoint for caches.
org.springframework.boot.cloudfoundry.autoconfigure.actuate.endpoint
Auto-configuration for Cloud Foundry endpoints.
org.springframework.boot.health.actuate.endpoint
Actuator endpoint for health.
org.springframework.boot.jersey.autoconfigure.actuate.web
Auto-configuration for Jersey actuator web concerns.
org.springframework.boot.micrometer.metrics.autoconfigure.export.prometheus
Support for exporting actuator metrics to Prometheus.
org.springframework.boot.quartz.actuate.endpoint
Actuator endpoint for Quartz Scheduler.
org.springframework.boot.webflux.actuate.endpoint.web
Spring WebFlux support for actuator endpoints.
org.springframework.boot.webflux.autoconfigure.actuate.web
Auto-configuration for WebFlux-based actuator web concerns.
org.springframework.boot.webmvc.actuate.endpoint.web
Spring MVC support for actuator endpoints.

    Class
    Description
    EndpointWebExtension
    Identifies a type as being a Web-specific extension of an @Endpoint.
